title: Give me my chat logs for 24 game restriction
body: I'm not sure why chat logs are no longer provided in game but I want to see the chat logs of the games that got me chat restricted. If I got restricted for calling out the 4 group premade trolls I am going to think this game is a lost cause.

replies.body: I was thinking of a joke like your a yasuo player your a lost cause but thats to mean spirited so ill just say hope you become less salty

I can't show chat logs on Boards for you or other players. However, if you write to Behavior Support for details [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and request your chat logs, they should be able to give it to you privately and better outline the context of your restriction there. Sadly there's no other help I can give for you here. :(
